product_name: Climb On! Skin Repair Bar - 1 oz.
long_description: All-natural, soothing Climb On! Skin Repair bar protects and moisturizes dry or chapped skin-it's great for climbers, skiers and mountaineers. Comes in a tin for taking anywhere; just pop the balm bar out and rub it on. Includes grapeseed oil, apricot kernel oil, beeswax, wheat germ oil, essential oils and vitamins A, C and E. Antiseptic and antibacterial. 1 oz. bar.
short_description: All-natural, soothing Climb On! Skin Repair bar protects and moisturizes dry or chapped skin-it's great for climbers, skiers and mountaineers.
